predicate.note: Frames file for 'revitalize' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 31.1.

example.name: the one example
example.text: The National Association of Broadcasters in June adopted an agenda for *trace* revitalizing AM radio that includes, among other things, pursuing further FCC action on selecting an AM stereo standard and seeking a law requiring all stereo receivers to include AM stereo.
